dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5804 IH: PRODUCE Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Menendez (for himself, Mr. Carter of Louisiana, Ms. Norton, Mr. Vargas, Mr. Carson, and Mr. Cohen) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 to reauthorize the Office of Urban Agriculture and Innovative Production.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Providing Robust Organics and Diets for Urban Communities Everywhere Act or the PRODUCE Act.

section.header: Reauthorization of Office of Urban Agriculture and Innovative Production
section.text: Section 222 of the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 (7 U.S.C. 6923) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (b)(5)(B), by striking 2023 and inserting 2030;
in subsection (d)(1)(C), by striking 2023 and inserting 2030; and
in subsection (e), by striking $25,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2019 through 2023 and inserting $50,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2025 through 2030.
